## Bio

Andrew currently lives in Washington, DC, working as a Data and Policy 
Analyst at Acumen, LLC. In this role, Andrew provides analytical and research 
support for the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) in the 
administration of the Outpatient Prospective Payment System (OPPS) and the Inpatient Psychiatric Facility Prospective Payment System (IPF PPS). His professional and 
academic interests include population health, chronic disease epidemiology, and 
value-based care.

<br>
